name: CM Product Recommendation Widget
author: CreativeMindsSolutions

sections.description:
Product Page | Videos | Demo | User Guide

Easily display recommended products, both local and external, based on the content that appears on your website’s pages or posts.

Product Recommendation plugin simplifies the process of referring readers to related products by automatically generating recommendation based on the content mentioned on each page or post.

Users can utilize this plugin to cross-sell their products or earn affiliate commissions.

The product recommendation appears as a widget featuring several related products displayed as images or text, with each product linked to its respective page on your WordPress site or an external site. A

dditionally, each term associated with the product within the post can be linked to the external product for easy access.

Product Recommendation Plugin Premium Editions

The Product Recommendation Plugin Premium edition includes even more powerful features, such as: export and import product, detailed reports on recommended products conversion, more styling option for the product widget and much more.

Product Recommendation Plugin Introduction Video

Using the Product Recommendation Plugin

  • Content Related Products – Show product recommendations based on context
  • Earn Affiliate Commission – Promote external products and receive affiliate commission
  • Easily Promote Your Own Products – Promote your own products on your blog posts
  • Conversion Reports – Show reports on each product’s performance

Basic Product Recommendation Plugin Features

  • Add related products to your posts
  • Unlimited number of products offered
  • Adjust Related Products widget style

Pro Version Features

Pro Version Detailed Features List | Demo Site

  • Show specific products based on categories
  • Supports multiple products per term
  • Locate widget anywhere in the post using a shortcode
  • More customization features easily accessible from the plugin settings
  • Product term can also have synonyms
  • Link and highlight product term or synonyms to the product itself
  • Import and export products between sites
  • Supports custom post types
  • Customize product recommendation widget look and feel
  • Two templates: choose between the fancy slider and the classic table
  • Add description for each product
  • Add weight to prioritize specific products
  • Reports and statistics

  • CM Download Manager – Allows users to upload, manage, track and support documents or files in a download directory listing database for others to contribute, use and comment upon.
  • CM Answers Plugin – A fully-featured WordPress Questions & Answers Plugin that allows you to build multiple discussion forum systems Just like StackOverflow, Yahoo Answers and Quora, Now with MicroPayment and Anonymous posting support!

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Define your terms under the plugin menu item in the administration interface. The title of the page should be the term. The body content should be the definition.
  4. There is a handful of other optional preferences available in the dashboard.
